column5: Was all pumped to be out fishing today - check out cottage and meet up with friends on big bald lake. Had to not go as daughter is ill (No fun with pukey child at cottage). Anyone else feeling like a cooped up chicken at the moment?  Looking forward to all the pictures and stories later living vacariously by everyone out there today.  Whats the best way to overcome the winter blues? Top answers I am going to go do
Turn up the thermostat to 80F put on some shorts open a beer and listen to the Beachboys/Jimmy Buffet.   Art

I'm home as well injured my hand at work and the cold is very painful on the most injured finger. So in the heat i stay as much as i can  Wish i had not done this to my hand gonna kill my ice fishing for this year.

been waiting to go fishing for weeks my auger was in ottawa so to day was the day and the she wakes up sick but still wanted to give it a go well drilled a couple of holes and she said she waanted to go. oh well stilll lots of winter left
Ummm...like art said...alcohol lol  J/K perhaps another hobby? I know there's gotta be others out there..I think

Outside in the fresh air for an hour. As much as you(anyone) may feel in the pits when you're sick, getting out helps.  Then back in with a big bowl full of real chicken or turkey soup(not the can crap).
